subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The injured French sailor Yann Elies has been rescued from his yacht by an Australian Navy ship. Elies broke his leg Thursday during the Vendée Globe round-the-world race. The race Web site said Elies was picked up by the frigate Arunta on Saturday, after it sailed 800 miles from Australia’s west coast.
